name: Cataclysm!
description: A critical mass of temporal paradoxes are occurring on the edge of space. Respond immediately, before the tenuous bonds holding time and space together are forever shred!
rules:
-- Earn Intel passively over time as well as from Ship Battles and Away Team Missions to initate a Cataclysm run.  
-- Cataclysm runs require you to defeat 10 opponents in order to complete the run. 
-- All Rarity of Ships are allowed to be used in each Cataclysm difficulty.
-- Every Ship Battle you win earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- Match one Battle Trait each Ship Battle to earn additional Victory Points and a small Hull Repair bonus (if selected) between Battles.
bonus_text: There are no Featured Ships or Crew for this Event

content.reroll_info:
Skirmish rewards are additive. By continuously rolling you receive additional rewards. No rewards are lost by rolling again.
DROP RATES:
Event VP: 13.58%
Time Portal Pack: 0.13%
Chronitons: 11.45%
Honor: 14.11%
Intel: 27.43%
Credits: 33.29%

screens.text: "Starships of differing chronitonal origins are engaged in combat, shifting in and out of time, resulting in a critical mass of paradox. If we do not resolve the situation so as to eliminate the paradox, the universe will be unable to bear the strain, and may simply... implode."
"There are Q who long for the mystery of death. I'm not one of them. Hurry, Captain--I'll help you as much as I can, but I'm only immortal."
